title: Bloomberg Markets: O'Shaughnessy on Investing in Micro-Caps
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: O'Shaughnessy on Investing in Micro-Caps
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: James Patrick O'Shaughnessy Chairman and CEO O'Shaughnessy Asset Management (OSAM) Discussing why micro is a great hunting ground for individual investors as very few equity management shops offer “true” micro strategies because they must be closed at very small AUM.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
